org.gjt.sp.jedit.gui

Class StatusBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.gjt.sp.jedit.gui.StatusBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class StatusBar
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The status bar used to display various information to the user. Currently, it is used for the following:
    • Displaying caret position information
    • Displaying InputHandler.readNextChar(String,String) prompts
    • Displaying setMessage(String) messages
    • Displaying I/O progress
    • Displaying various editor settings
    • Displaying memory status
    Since:
    jEdit 3.2pre2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
